items.content_html: Minimal Notes is a lightweight and intuitive notes application built with TypeScript and Node.js. It allows users to create, edit, delete, and search notes efficiently. The app features a clean user interface, persistent storage, and a seamless experience for managing notes.
items.title: AmarNafais/Minimal-Notes: Minimal Notes is a lightweight and intuitive notes application built with TypeScript and Node.js. It allows users to create, edit, delete, and search notes efficiently. The app features a clean user interface, persistent storage, and a seamless experience for managing notes.

items.content_html: rebyb-redux is a lightweight, Redux-like state management library for React applications, designed for simplicity and efficiency. Built with TypeScript, it allows developers to easily manage global state with a minimal setup. With features like customizable initial state, single and multi-dispatch capabilities

Built with TypeScript, it allows developers to easily manage global state with a minimal setup. With features like customizable initial state, single and multi-dispatch capabilities
